description: From Middle English erthewarde, erþewarde, equivalent to earth +‎ -ward.

adjectives.description: earthward (comparative more earthward, superlative most earthward)

entries.meaning: Towards or in the direction of the Earth.

adverbs.description: earthward (comparative more earthward, superlative most earthward)

entries.meaning: Towards or in the direction of the Earth.
